channel.title: Utorrent Portforward help?
channel.description: ok i need advice on how to portforward on utorrent i found a thread last nite but then i lost it today it was made by invalid but hes muted and its been taken away. i have searched the forums for a few hours now and i still can't find it anyhelp ?

item.title: Utorrent Portforward help?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Ok so u need help portforwarding? il giv u a lil Tut,

download utorrent 1.8.1 install it

step 1,

when u have downloaded it and installed it double-click utorrent, it will open,

step 2,

now goto [options] then [prefences] now look at the left hand-side you will see sum words and stuff, click on [connection]

step 3,

now you will see, [random port] button,.. will sum random numbers near it, change the [random numbers] to = 43594

step 4,

now apply then ok, make sure u keep up utorrent for the server to run,..

hope that helped,

Read full topic
